title: What is your go-to song when you are feeling happy or sad? - Quora

response.answer_text: Personally, I feel like every song is a sad song if you think about it long enough. Happy songs? They make me sad. Sad songs? They make me sadder. So here’s a list of songs I find to be fucking amazing !! Perfect - The The (the lyrics in this song are so powerful) Only a shadow - The Cleaners From Venus Say Anything - Girl In Red (works great if you’re a sad, lonely lesbian like me Night Drive - Part Time Desire - Current Joys (oh god I’ve wept to this on repeat) Freaks - Surf Curse (SOB to this) And of course, you can’t be sad without The Smiths !! Rubber Ring and the infamous There Is a Light that Never Goes Out !! My favorite band of all time is Crywank. All of their songs are sad. I love their album “Egg on Face. Foot in mouth. Wriggling Wriggling Wriggling” because of the fact it’s so whimsical with melancholic undertones. You’re welcome :)
Fight song. It can pick me up when I'm feeling down and also I can have a dance party to it when I'm happy.
